function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of disease transmission through overcrowding in green spaces","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, enforce social distancing guidelines, limit the capacity of green spaces","Technologies":"Surveillance technology to monitor crowd density, mobile apps for booking time slots in green spaces","People":"General public, visitors to green spaces","Owner":"Local authorities, park management"},{"Description":"Risk of reduced beneficial health effects due to overcrowding in green spaces","Impact":"Decreased physical distancing, increased stress, and reduced mental and physical health benefits","Mitigation":"Educate the public about responsible use of green spaces, provide alternative local recreational opportunities, and promote off-peak usage","Technologies":"Informational signage, public awareness campaigns, virtual fitness classes","People":"General public, visitors to green spaces","Owner":"Local authorities, health organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of long-term resilience against future shocks being compromised by overcrowding in green spaces","Impact":"Reduced capacity of green spaces to provide refuge service and resilience in future pandemics or similar shocks","Mitigation":"Develop and enhance alternative green spaces, invest in urban planning for sustainable recreational opportunities, and establish green space management protocols","Technologies":"Green infrastructure development, urban planning software, remote sensing for green space monitoring","People":"Urban planners, local authorities, environmental organizations","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners"}]}
